parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A BaseAudioContext representing the audio context you want the node to be associated with.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: A ChannelMergerOptions dictionary object defining the properties you want the ChannelMergerNode to have (It also inherits the options defined in the AudioNodeOptions dictionary): numberOfInputs: A number defining the number of inputs the ChannelMergerNode should have. If not specified, the default value used is 6.
